Django and Payton developers teamed up with clinicians and researchers to release a new analytics platform called OpenSafely that allows researchers to analyze NHS health records from over 24 million people In the UK. With strict safety and privacy standards, OpenSafely may help redefine how medical data is analyzed and shared.

PEP 618, which adds a new strict parameter to the built-in zip() function that optionally enforces same-length iterables, has been accepted for Python 3.10. Read the acceptance letter here and some interesting discussion about the PEP on Reddit.

    • July 5

PyGotham TV is the online version of NYCâ€™s annual Python conference. It will take place this October 2nd and 3rd. The call for talk proposals is open now through July 5. You could propose an infomercial, a talk show, a comedy routine, a sitcom, or just a regular tech talk about Python or any technology subject that interests you. PyGotham is an eclectic conference that covers policy, culture, and art, along with standard tech and Python topics.

entry.content:
ä»¤æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ æŠ•å…¥ç”Ÿäº§

åŸæ–‡: PyCoder's Weekly - Issue #425

    • VICKI BOYKIS

Millions of web apps get deployed to production every day. But machine learning models arenâ€™t web apps. And very few people are talking about deployment. Learn how tools like Streamlit can help take the edge off deploying your machine learning models.

  • Python ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ä»‹ç»
    • REAL PYTHON
    • course

In this step-by-step course, youâ€™ll learn about generators and yielding in Python. Youâ€™ll create generator functions and generator expressions using multiple Python yield statements. Youâ€™ll also learn how to build data pipelines that take advantage of these Pythonic tools.

(æ˜¯ä¹Ÿä¹:

)

  • çš®å°¤ç ”ç©¶ä¸­å¿ƒçš„ Python åº“

Performance optimization is a tricky subject and silver bullets are rare. This article shines a light on some of the common misconceptions around async Python, like â€œasync is always faster.â€ Related discussion on Hacker News.

(æ˜¯ä¹Ÿä¹:

åˆå­¦è€…å›°å¢ƒ...

çœŸå®åœºæ™¯ä¸­ï¼š

1ã€å¼‚æ­¥ web æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸å¯ä½¿ç”¨ reverse proxyï¼Œå› ä¸º async server æ€§èƒ½é«˜äº reverse proxyã€‚ç“¶é¢ˆä½ç½®åœ¨ reverse proxy å’Œ wsgi å±‚è€Œé web serverã€‚ä½¿ç”¨ reverse proxy æ˜¯å› ä¸ºå¤šçº¿ç¨‹ context åˆ‡æ¢æˆæœ¬é«˜ï¼Œå¼€ä¸äº†å¾ˆå¤šï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªèƒ½æ— é™å¼€ context çš„å¼‚æ­¥æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼ˆnginxï¼‰æŒ¡åœ¨å‰é¢ã€‚è€Œæœ¬èº«å¼‚æ­¥çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸éœ€è¦ã€‚

2ã€å¼‚æ­¥ web server ä¸å¯ä½¿ç”¨ connection pool å’Œæ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ— è®ºæ˜¯åç¨‹è¿˜æ˜¯çº¯å•çº¿ç¨‹å¼‚æ­¥ï¼Œåç¨‹æ•°å’Œè¿æ¥æ•°éƒ½ç”¨ä¸å®Œã€‚ç”±äºä¸å­˜åœ¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹æˆ–è€…å¤šè¿›ç¨‹çš„ context åˆ‡æ¢æˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´åªèƒ½èµ·æœ‰é™çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦è¿æ¥æ± ã€‚å¼‚æ­¥çš„è¿æ¥æ•°ç”¨ä¸å®Œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸éœ€è¦è¿æ¥æ± ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šæˆä¸ºç“¶é¢ˆã€‚

3ã€å¼‚æ­¥æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ¨å¹¶å‘æ•°è¶…è¿‡ 1000 æ—¶æ‰ä¼šæ˜æ˜¾ä½“ç°å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œsync æœåŠ¡å™¨å³ä½¿åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ reverse proxy çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ç”±äºä¸­é—´çš„ä»£ç†æŸè€—ä¹Ÿå¾ˆéš¾å¤„ç† 1000 ä»¥ä¸Šçš„å¹¶å‘ã€‚æˆ‘åœ¨å¯¹å¼‚æ­¥æœåŠ¡å™¨åšæ€§èƒ½æµ‹è¯•çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ˜¯æµ‹è¯•ç¨‹åºå…ˆæŒºä¸ä½ï¼ŒçœŸå®æµ‹è¯•å¼‚æ­¥æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„æ€§èƒ½çš„æŠ€æœ¯å«é‡ä¸ä½ï¼Œåˆå­¦è€…åšä¸åˆ°ã€‚

è¿™ç¯‡ä½œå“æ§½ç‚¹å¤ªå¤šï¼Œå…ˆè¯´ä»¥ä¸Šå‡ ç‚¹ã€‚ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªè®²è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œè¦æ‰“ä¸€å¤©çš„å­—ã€‚
